item.title: show hn：wheretowatch.stream - 查看电影/节目在全球流式传输的位置
item.description:
I built https://wheretowatch.stream to solve a problem I kept running into: finding out which country actually has a movie or show available on Netflix, Prime, etc.You can search any title (even obscure ones) and instantly see where it’s available, on which platform, and in which country — no单击需要登录。
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444295485 点：1 ＃评论：0
